data.oai_dc:dc: OCNMS: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Makah Bay, Washington, USA (MB042)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Makah Bay, Washington, USA, by OCNMS. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2004-08-02. The instrument depth was 022 meters, in an overall water depth of 42 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 10.0 minutes.
